name: FRAKTIΛ
description: FRAKTIΛ is a decentralized execution layer for AI agents, purpose-built to enable modular intelligence, voice I/O and autonomous coordination across real-world workflows. It introduces a no-code deployment system, behavioral runtime and tokenized Add-On ecosystem, allowing anyone to deploy, configure and monetize intelligent agents. The native token $FRAKTIA is used for activating Add-Ons, paying for usage and participating in governance. By combining modular containers with on-chain reputation and revenue distribution, FRAKTIΛ empowers developers, validators and contributors to build verifiable agent-based infrastructure at scale, on-chain and off-chain.
